activities: Our customers use our service to collect information about the Internet usage and location of Wi-Fi-enabled devices near and within their facilities. If Wi-Fi device users choose to join our customers' guest Wi-Fi networks, those users may voluntarily provide personal information to our customer, which we store on behalf of our customers. We may also store personal information transferred to us by our customers, the details of which would be described in their own privacy policies.
contacttitle1: Director of Product Management and Privacy
recoursemech: If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we agree to participate in the dispute resolution procedures of the American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program, http://go.adr.org/safeharbor) pursuant to the Safe Harbor Principles.
